description: A Micronesian state suffered a ransomware attack and was forced to shut down all computers of its government health agency. A state in Micronesia, the state of Yap, suffered a ransomware attack, forcing the shutdown of all computers in its government health agency. title: A ransomware attack hit the Micronesian state of Yap, causing the health system network to go down.
